messages.message: I'm good thanks, do you like pie?
Hell yes! Are we buying some pie?
No, just want to know if there's anybody else in the pie society...
YES! I'm the head pie eater there...
Ok, here's my card number: 4321567890121234. What's your phone number bob? I'll send you the adress of the pie shop...
it's 07804377261. Thanks, looking forward to the pie!

user_activity_report: This is the report for the most active users, in orderof the number of messages they sent:
